author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ANZ Finalises Reinsurance Arrangements With Zurich, Receives $1 Bln Of Reinsurance Proceeds
text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd:
* FINALISED REINSURANCE ARRANGEMENTS WITH ZURICH AND HAS RECEIVED AROUND $1 BILLION OF REINSURANCE PROCEEDS
* REINSURANCE PROCEEDS RESULT IN INCREASE OF 25BPS IN ANZâ€™S APRA COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 CAPITAL
* WILL CONTINUE TO WORK THROUGH CAPITAL MANAGEMENT OPTIONS, WHICH MAY INCLUDE AN ADDITIONAL ON-MARKET BUYBACK OF $1 BILLION TO $1.5 BILLION
* PURCHASE OF SHARES ASSOCIATED WITH DRP IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE ON 18 MAY AND CONTINUE UNTIL 31 MAY Source text for Eikon:
Our
